title: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.

title: Cappuccino
description: An espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy. It is composed of double espresso and steamed milk, topped with a layer of foamed milk.

title: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, often topped with a small amount of foamed milk. It can be flavored with syrups like vanilla or caramel.

title: Mocha
description: A coffee drink that combines espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk. It is often topped with whipped cream and chocolate drizzle.

title: Americano
description: A coffee drink made by diluting an espresso shot with hot water. It has a similar strength to drip coffee but a different flavor profile.

title: Macchiato
description: An espresso-based coffee drink with a small amount of milk. It can be either an espresso macchiato (espresso with a dollop of milk) or a latte macchiato (milk with a splash of espresso).

title: Flat White
description: A coffee drink consisting of espresso and microfoam (velvety textured milk). It originated in Australia and New Zealand and has become popular worldwide.
